players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: " I'm concerned about the sudden death and want to know more about what happened last night."
Charlie: " I'm glad we have a detective on our side, and I think we should focus on finding out more about Bob's death. We need to work together to uncover the truth."
Diana: "I think we should ask the detective to investigate Bob's body and see if they can find any clues about what happened last night."
